A small lens pops up on Meteara's chest. In a matter of seconds, it 
projects a highly detailed holographic view of the planet. She points 
at the lower end of the southernmost continent.

Meteara: I can't pinpoint exactly where the voice came from, but I am 
assured that I am the only one on this planet that can truly 
communicate with it. The language they speak is known to the Vok. I 
think, though, that we can find something there. As for what we look 
for...

She transforms to beast mode and looks to the glacial sea in front.

Meteara: You are right about this piece here, Cybertronian Firaxis. It 
seems like a piece of some kind. I know not more. What called me 
though, is called a Soul Orb. Their makers are enemies of the True 
Vok. It was a challenge that they sent me.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Firaxis::
>        "Aye ma'am."  He picks up the artifact and places it in a 
storage 
> compartment in his shoulder.  "So what do you suppose this thing is? 
 It 
> seems technical but it's way beyond anything I've ever seen."  He 
shrugs.  
> "So where to now?"
